text:
~Hello,~
~I am encountering some bugs I am unable to debug when using Panels. I have simply copied the sample code provided on <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/ui-components/standard-components/panel#panel-%7C-ui-components-(beta)|this page>. I do not get any error logs in my IDE, but some React errors in console. Has anyone encountered this before?~

Nevermind, my ui-extension version was not updated. Running npm i @HubSpot/ui-extensions fixed it
Yeah Iâ€™d love for this functionality. We pull in line items and this functionality would be better
<@U25PYL3Q8> no, you will get the very short demo during the call
Hi everyone. Does anyone know how to enable what this message said?

I think it is this one <@U089VUQFFFD>
Just swap your HubSpot account ID in the URL and note that only Enterprise accounts can use the extenstions.

<https://app.HubSpot.com/product-updates/[HubSpot-ACCOUNT-ID]/in-beta?&update=13961255>
